location: Xinyi Road Section 2, 59 meters from Dongmen MRT Station
notes: Mid-range renovated apartment (within 3 years) with 3BR/2BA layout. Good for families with elevator access, cross-ventilation (north-south), and 3 balconies for natural light. Near Dongmen MRT and Yongkang commercial area. Note: No pets allowed. Management fee adds NT$4,600/month. Could not assess baby safety details (railings, corners) without images.
